alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 3:07AM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19 expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, southwest and west central Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
